description.full: The gallery lets out a distant roar. Your lead is down to one. Tiger Woods and a cast of PGA TOUR速 champions are breathing down your neck. As you stand at the 18th tee, all eyes are on you. Enter the world of high-pressure championship golf in Tiger Woods PGA TOUR速 10. Feed off the intensity and rise above the competition to become the next golf legend.  Some multi-player functionalities may no longer be supported.
